trans-unit.source: Provides data for a <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent" /> event that is raised when you click on a selected control or a designer region in a selected control.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona datos a un evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent" /> que se provoca al hacer clic en un control seleccionado o en una región del diseñador en un control seleccionado.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta clase no puede heredarse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is raised by the designer host for certain actions on a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> evento es desencadenado por el host del diseñador para determinadas acciones en un control en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: For example, an event is raised when you click a selected control or a designer region in a selected control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, un evento se desencadena al hacer clic en un control seleccionado o en una región del diseñador en un control seleccionado en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase proporciona un delegado predeterminado para controlar la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> eventos.

trans-unit.source: When you click a selected control or a designer region of a selected control at design time, the designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event type, and then sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property with a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: Al hacer clic en un control seleccionado o en una región del Diseñador de un control seleccionado en tiempo de diseño, el host del diseñador inicializa un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> de objeto para un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> tipo de evento y, a continuación, Establece la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> propiedad con un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> objeto.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates that you clicked a designer region, the default delegate in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class passes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Cuando el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> objeto indica que ha hecho clic en una región del diseñador, el delegado predeterminado de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase pasa el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> el objeto a la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method to process events that are raised when you click a control in the design host.
trans-unit.target: Las clases que derivan de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> clase invalidación el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> método para procesar los eventos que se producen al hacer clic en un control en el host de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region%2A> property represents the control designer region that the event applies to, if any.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region%2A> propiedad representa la región del Diseñador de control que se aplica el evento, si existe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location%2A> property represents the location on the design surface that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location%2A> propiedad representa la ubicación en la superficie de diseño que se hizo clic.

trans-unit.source: For more information about events and delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre eventos y delegados, vea [NIB: delegados y eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> to identify the region that was clicked and to change the view accordingly.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> para identificar la región en la que se hizo clic y cambiar la vista en consecuencia.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion> class.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo forma parte de un ejemplo mayor proporcionado para el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion> clase.

trans-unit.source: The designer region that was clicked; used to initialize the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: Región del diseñador donde se ha hecho clic con el mouse; se utiliza para inicializar la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region" />.

trans-unit.source: The location that was clicked, relative to the upper left corner of the region; used to initialize the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location" />.
trans-unit.target: Ubicación en la que se hizo clic, en relación con el ángulo superior izquierdo de la región; se utiliza para inicializar <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs" /> class with the specified region and location.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs" /> con la región y la posición especificadas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> delegate method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor to initialize a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object for use with a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> delegar método usa la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> un constructor para inicializar una <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> objeto para su uso con un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> objeto.

trans-unit.source: When you click a control region at design time, the designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event type, and then sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property with a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: Al hacer clic en una región del control en tiempo de diseño, el host del diseñador inicializa un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> de objeto para un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> tipo de evento y, a continuación, Establece la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> propiedad con un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the location within the control that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la ubicación del control en la que se hizo clic.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> identifying the location within the region that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que identifica la ubicación de la región en la que se hizo clic.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location%2A> property contains the coordinates that identify where you clicked, relative to the upper left corner of the region.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location%2A> propiedad contiene las coordenadas que identifican donde hizo clic, en relación con la esquina superior izquierda de la región.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location%2A> property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Location%2A> propiedad se inicializa con el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer region that was clicked, if any.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la región del diseñador donde se ha hecho clic, si la hay.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion" /> that the click event applies to, or <see langword="null" /> if no region was clicked.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion" /> al que se aplica el evento de clic, o <see langword="null" /> si no se hizo clic en ninguna región.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region%2A> property represents the control designer region that was clicked, if any.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region%2A> propiedad representa la región del Diseñador de control que se hizo clic, si lo hay.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region%2A> property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.Region%2A> propiedad se inicializa con el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> to identify the region that was clicked and to change view accordingly.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> para identificar el área que se hizo clic y cambiar la vista en consecuencia.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion> class.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo forma parte de un ejemplo mayor proporcionado para el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion> clase.
